title: So crowded in BTS
review: Please avoid to take BTS from 1630 2000 hrs So crowded  But its the best option if you need to go somewhere  No need  to fight with Taxi driver

result.opinion: Best option if you need to go somewhere
The best option if you need to go somewhere.

title: Confused
review: Probably ok if you don't need to change lines I was very confused and the people I asked for help were in my position also The friendly Thai people came to my rescue which was very kind and we reached our destination For the money in my opinion taxi or tuk tuk is a better option especially if you are in a group Good way to see the city

result.opinion: Confused and needed help

title: The best way to get around in Bangkok
review: Buy an one day ticket  140 baht You can get onoff all day It's so easy The announcements for each stop are in Thai and English  It's clean and has AC Superb

result.opinion: Easy to use, on and off all day
It's clean and has AC

title: Extremely Convenient
review: Super easy way to travel across Bangkok as long as your destination is near the limited routes Can easily get close to your destination and then either walk or TukTuk it the rest of the way

result.opinion: Super easy way to travel across Bangkok

title: LOVE the BTS
review: The BTS is very efficient clean and safe It beats the heck out of Bangkok traffic The only negative is the it is not as extensive as rail is in other cities but it is great nonetheless

result.opinion: The BTS is very efficient, clean and safe.
The BTS is very efficient, clean, and safe.
The BTS is very efficient, clean, and safe.

title: Nice experience but needs to cover more areas!!!
review: Nice experiencespecially if you live in the heart of Bangkok busy city  but it didn't covers all the attractions in Bangkok Very cheap comparing with other international cities

title: Skytrain
review: Clean cheap punctual We travelled all over Bangkok via the sky train We found the ticket machines easy to navigate although always have change with you as they don't take notes A typical 15 minute fare is about 35 baht Finding a seat is easy although around Siam station (shopping Malls) it does get very busy Best way to the the city

result.opinion: Punctual
Clean

title: Superb way to get around
review: As a family we had two days in Bangkok and used the BTS skytrain extensively We bought day passes for 150bht each It's easy to use and the routes are clearly marked The skytrain is fast reliable efficient and clean Certainly beats haggling with taxis and being stuck in traffic A definite experience when in central Bangkok

result.opinion: The skytrain is clean.

title: Enjoyable travel and no much rush during holidays
review: Cost seems to be a bit high particularly when we compare with the Uber rate for a family of 4 or 5 people Citizens very cooperative and seeing our family (of tourists) a lady gave place to my daughter to sit

result.opinion: Cost seems to be a bit high particularly when we compare with the Uber rate for a family of 4 or 5 people Citizens very cooperative and seeing our family (of tourists) a lady gave place to my daughter to sit

title: Convenient!
review: BTS is very easy to navigate and cheap for users (cheaper than most countries) but high quality trains and very safe

result.opinion: Very safe

title: BTS sky train
review: The BTS sky train is a great way to get around Bangkok very easy to get tickets via ticket machine or from the ticket kiosk trains are clean and have announcements in English and Thai

result.opinion: The trains are clean
The BTS sky train is a great way to get around Bangkok.

title: wow wish we had them in London
review: these are an excellent via of getting around you are not allowed to eat or drink on them and there is proper air con only down side the stations that we used were not very accessible if you had mobility issues

title: Excellent
review: Very easy to navigate don't be afraid to try it out  You can get all around the city in no time at all

result.opinion: Very easy to navigate

title: Nothing changed since many years ago
review: The lack of lift access at the station to platform as well as from road level to station   Escalator is only available to access from station to platform but not the reverse unless at Siam station So if you have baggage to carry it's nightmare to climb down the stairs Phai thai station (interchange station w airport rail) horrible no lift no escalator   Very old type of trains too Overall disapppointed

result.opinion: Disappointed that there is a lack of lift access at the station.

Lack of lift access at the station to platform as well as from road level to station Escalator is only available to access from station to platform but not the reverse unless at Siam station So if you have baggage to carry it's nightmare to climb down the stairs Phai thai station (interchange station w airport rail) horrible no lift no escalatorVery old type of trains too Overall disapppointed that

title: Quickest way of traveling in Bangkok !
review: After using Tuk Tuk taxied we tried the BTS  In Bangkok there is always rush hours  Always traffic jams  So Bts is the best and the quickest way to travel in this city  All the trains are with air condition systems which is great  The staff and also all people help you if you have any questions regarding traveling to any place   You always buy the tickets in the machines and usually you can buy them in a tickets box located in the stations In few of the stations at some hours you cannot buy tickets from tickets box but only to change for coins and then use the machines What I found uncomfortable was two things  1 You must buy tickets in the station you travel from They do not sell 2 ways tickets But line wasn't to bad and went fast all times 2 I was with a baby stroller so in some stations you do not have escalatorslifts There were lifts however the lifts were locked It looked quit new so they might open them soon Generally this was the best way to travel

result.opinion: The best way to travel, great air conditioning, helpful staff, convenient ticket machines.

title: Easy to use
review: I've been living in Bangkok for 6 months and when I travel throughout the city the BTS is the best way to go The train is easy to use and gives access to most places in Bangkok It is also not as expensive as other modes of transport

result.opinion: The BTS is easy to use and gives access to most places in Bangkok.
BTS is the best way to travel in Bangkok

title: Convenient, clean and reliable
review: BTS is the best transportation to go around Bangkok Bangkok traffic is not good  Better to use rabbit card so that you don't need to wait in line to buy tickets

result.opinion: BTS is the best transportation to go around Bangkok

title: Love it.
review: This is the quickest way to get across Bangkok but be warned it can be very busy with standing room only on these trains The door slides open and there's just a wall of people in there You just have to push your way on and grab hold of something Very cheap to use too Just select the stop you want to go to then put your coins in the slot and take your ticket If your unsure just watch the Thais for clues but there's alway's someone willing to help It's faster and cheaper than a taxi but there's so many stairs to climb in the heat The trains do have aircon

result.opinion: Quickest way to get across Bangkok, cheap to use, faster and cheaper than a taxi

title: Convenient and Affordable transport to whole Bangkok
review: Affordable way of transportation around Bangkok Minimum fare is 15 bht per station Every 5 to 10 min Interval of the trains Safe Convenient when not rush hours and that's normal Stations and trains are clean duty guards on standby

result.opinion: Convenient when not rush hours

title: The fastest way to get around Bangkok

title: Best way to avoid traffic
review: The Bangkok BTS is comparable to HK's MTR and SG's MRTLRT The difference it is not underground hence the name Skytrain It has more stairs How i wish the Thailand's Gov't can put additional elevators and escalators so that it will be just optional for the commuters to use the stairs

title: Fast, efficient. And most importantly air conditioned.
review: When tuk tuk drivers try to scam you Taxis Don‚Äôt use the meter Traffic is horrendous The BTS is a godsend Yes it‚Äôs busy but there are constant trains It‚Äôs super cheap and do yourself a favor spend the 100bht and buy a rabbit card it‚Äôs a rechargeable and better than waiting each time to buy a ticket Also most stations only take coins in the machines so you have to line up twice Once to  get change and once to buy a ticket The rabbit is excellent and you can even use it to pay for some shops Like family mart etc

title: Never again

review: The BTS Skytrain is so first world   Easy to use and affordable It helps that the maps and announcements are in English too I was so impressed with the Skytrain

title: So helpful
review: I love strolling round Bangkok using this kinda trasnportation Timesaver BTS already connected to some mall and i found it very easy for tourists to travel without any special guide   Only in Bangkok i really dont mind to bring a quite big luggage using mass transport like this  Other thing i love is Mini stall at every BTS station i can find bakery snacks and others )

title: Clean Skytrain
review: Skytrain in Bangkok is very impressive  Clean efficient and well maintained  Maps are all over to help travelers get into the right trains  Sufficient number of self service machines are installed as well  Exits were properly marked clearly that leads to the right exits  Very handicap friendly too since elevators are installed for travelers having loads to carry or for pregnant and senior citizens  Best way to travel to get rid of traffic on land

title: Had to try.
review: Fun experience A bit hard to know when you are at your station but pay attention or go back and forth for a while )

title: Good experience with BTS bangkok
review: Most time I take taxi from airport to hotel and other places  but long queuing  and miscommunication with taxi driver  and often over charge by the taxi  traffic jam   so one day I try ask one western foreigner teach me how to use local bts from airport to hotel  and supprisingly is not difficult at all  and not crowded like in Hong Kong Mrt too  here bts is very clean  have air Con  English sign and map too  safe and clean  and very cheap too  almost cover all impotent location in bangkok  am not sure they operate 24 hours or not  but I did use one time at night around 11  they still operate  well it is really good transportation for foeringer to use  especially for female traveler is more safe  when you do not understand about the road and can not speak thai language  cause I had many times been drive around by taxi driver  and he keep drive refuse to stop and do not respond my English at all  and that was very scary feeling when you were alone sit inside car and no ideal where you were  so be careful before you take taxi  make sure the driver understand English and local 911 number keep with in your mobile phone  but over rall  bangkok is exciting city to discover  just try learn to be more smart and wise to spent your money on  best experience

result.opinion: BTS is a safe, clean, and cheap transportation option in Bangkok, especially for female travelers who may not speak Thai or understand the roads.

title: Skytrain
review: Very good Fast and clean Easy way to Travel trough Bangkoküòä We spend five days in Bangkok and try different ways of traveling THE train was the fastest and safest way for us

result.opinion: Very good, fast, and clean.  Easy way to travel through Bangkok. The train was the fastest and safest way for us. Cleanliness was important to us.
Very good, fast, clean, easy way to travel

title: Excellent service
review: So affordable and time efficient You also get to look the city from the "sky"üòÜ Good to have map handy and ask the officials if you have questions not the people around They can be misleading but not in a bad way

result.opinion: Affordable and time efficient Good to have map handy and ask the officials if you have questions

title: Best skytrain service
review: The BTS Skytrain is a Bon for the tourists They are very comfortable and commute to every corner of the city in Bangkok at a very nominal charges The best advice I can give is to click a picture of the base station and while coming back you can show the picture at the ticket counter and heshe will give you the ticket and guide you to the track the train would come

result.opinion: Very comfortable and commute to every corner of the city in Bangkok at a very nominal charges

title: Convenient at most.
review: The metro is mostly crowded as is the norm in several Asian countries It connects a good part of the city but not all the major part of the network is under construction I think The connectivity from the Suvarnabhumi to the Bangkok city is also very convenient and economical and the metro is mostly empty at the initial few metro stations I used the Rome2Rio app to help me guide through for getting from Point A to Point B It provided with the best route options along with the prices The second also the older Don Muang Airport Bangkok doesn't have the direct connectivity with the metro from the City But one can get A1 Line Airport Bus on an hourly basis from Mo Chit Metro Station It costs around 30 Thai Baht

result.opinion: The metro is mostly empty at the initial few metro stations.

title: Easy mode of transport
review: Easy to navigate fairly cheap and gets you to places Gets very crowded at peak hours but definitely better than being caught in Bangkok's notorious traffic jams

result.opinion: Easy to navigate, fairly cheap and gets you to places

title: Convenient public transportation
review: Like the bts  it is convenient  The security guards all courteus Only the ticket purchasing is a bit confusing as many of them only take coins

result.opinion: Like the bts it is convenient

title: Packed like a tin of sardines
review: The thing i like the most about the BTS is that it is overgroundyou can catch views It is fast and efficient too  While the rest of the tourists struggle haggling with tuk tuks and taxi driversyou can reach your destination at a fraction of the cost and time  That said it is not ideal during busy hours as it is used by city commuters as it rightly should If you attempt it during office start and end hoursyou will be a sardinemake no doubts And yesdont attempt it with kids at that time  I liked the ticketing machines No fussa number is mentioned agains the station you need to head to Select that number and drop coins in the slot If you are short of change the ticket counter obliges

result.opinion: Liked the ticketing machines, no fuss

title: Excellent connectivity around Bangkok
review: BTS is the most convenient way to get around in Bangkok It's low cost and very fast as it is true with any metro rail system these days One thing that surprised me was the frequency of trains I did not wait in any of the stations for more than a minute before the train arrived  The stations were really clean and officers very helpful be it at the counter or the ones who did security check on our way to airport I also liked the fact that the connectivity to airport was so smooth that I will never take a taxi again to SVB airport unless I am carrying heavy luggage   One is the best rail systems I have seen in recent times in a metro

result.opinion: BTS is the most convenient way to get around in Bangkok It's low cost and very fast The frequency of trains was surprising The stations were really clean and officers very helpful I liked the connectivity to the airport One of the best rail systems I have seen

title: Easy to navigate, super convenient!
review: Beat all the traffic and hop on the Skytrain  Ordering tickets is super straightforward as well as the maps  Very tourist friendly and the trains come very frequently

result.opinion: Very tourist friendly and the trains come very frequently

title: So easy and cheap!
review: Definitely recommend using the SkyTrain to get around Bangkok There are names written in English and it's easy and straightforward to figure out where you are and where you need to go Also airconditioning on these rocks

result.opinion: Definitely recommend using the SkyTrain

title: Fast but
review: Fastest mass transport in bkk but always full so that it's very high chance especially in rush hour that you may have to wait for another train

title: Best way to get around Bangkok
review: Really good and excellent air conditioning The quickest way to get across town  Cheap but most tickets need to be bought using coins Get a day pass if you are going to travel to different stops

result.opinion: Really good and excellent air conditioning

title: Very quick
review: Super quick and convenient one of the best public transports in Bangkok by a mile Also very good prices

title: Best option to get around town all day/night
review: The BTS is great especially if you want to get a lot done within the day Whether you are in BKK for business or pleasure BTS beats taking a taxilimo  and sitting in the famous Bangkok traffic for hours

result.opinion: BTS is convenient for getting a lot done within the day

title: Confusing at times
review: This was our mode of transportation in Bangkok and the trains run like every 10 minutes  I got one of those cards that you can load but note that when you reload it there's a minimum of 100 baht  The card was very useful because you don't have to fall in line to buy tickets  The only thing I don't like about their system is (1) sometimes there are no escalators so you have to take the stairs and (2) the signs where the train is heading is sometimes not the end destination sometimes it is the famous stop I think  So for example I wanted to go to silom from national stadium so I looked at the map and it showed I have to take the train that goes to Wong wian (final destination) When I got to the platform I didn't see Wong Wian but I saw sathorn and mochit  Luckily I went to mochit the other day and I know it's for chatuchak so I took the risk and took the train that heads to sathorn  When I got in the train I noticed that Sathorn is like a stop where you can transfer to another train  So as a tip bring a map with you or download it on your phone  It will be very handy while you travel

result.opinion: The card was very useful because you don't have to fall in line to buy tickets

title: Clean & Convenice
review: Skytrain was my main travel way when staying at Bangkok which is very clean and wellfitted for frequency of train everyday It is not too crowd

review: The skytrain is the best way to get around congested city It covers only a small portion of Bangkok and runs from 6 AM to about midnight If you are staying more than a day buy a Rabbit Card and load it with a few hundred bahts to avoid standing in line to purchase tickets

title: Fast and clean. Best way to get to airport

title: BTS is a great way to travel  Dr. Mike Smith New York
review: I have travelled to Thailand for the last 10 years and always use the BTS It is very efficient clean reasonably priced and great hours of operation I usually get a day pass for about $4 which saves money and time from not having to get a card for each trip It also has good connections to the Metro subway system as well and is easy to navigate Also the staff has always been very helpful and friendly

title: ÊòØÂèØËÉΩÈ´îÈ©óÁï∂Âú∞ÁîüÊ¥ªÊ≠•Ë™øÁöÑ‰∫§ÈÄöÊñπÂºè
review: ÂèØËÉΩÊúâ‰∫õÁ´ôÈªûÈÇÑÊ≤íÊúâÂª∫ÊßãÂÆåÊàêÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•Â¶ÇÊûúË¶ÅÂà∞‰∏Ä‰∫õÊôØÈªûÊàñË≥ºÁâ©‰∏≠ÂøÉÈÇÑË¶ÅÂÜçÊèõËªäÔºå‰ΩÜ‰∏ç‰∏ÄÂÆöË¶ÅÂùêË®àÁ®ãËªäÔºåÊúâ‰∫õË≥ºÁâ©ÈªûÊúâÂÖçË≤ªÁöÑÊé•ÈßÅËªäÔºåÂè™ÊòØ‰Ω†ÂèØËÉΩË¶ÅÂøçÂèó‰∏Ä‰∏ãÊ≥∞ÂúãÁöÑÂ§ßÂ§™ÈôΩÔºåÈõñÁÑ∂‰∫∫ÊúâÈªûÂ§öÔºå‰ΩÜÁúüÁöÑÂèØ‰ª•ÊääËá™Â∑±ÁöÑÂøÉÊÉÖÊîæËºïÈ¨Ü‰∏ÄÈªûÔºåÈÄô‰πüÊòØÊóÖË°åÁöÑÊ®ÇË∂£‰∏çÊòØÂóéÔºü  Some of the station of BTS still construction so maybe you will need a taxi to some sightseeing spots or shopping mall but if you surfing on internet you will discover some shopping mall provide the free shuttle bus that will let you get more closer to your destination but the sun of Thailand is powerful beware the hotyou know it But I think it is a funny experience when you travelling at Bangkok right

title: Fast and cheap mode of transportation
review: Travelled to Bangkok for a short stay and have already read a lot about BTS and MRT  As I wanted to travel like a local on a shoestring budget I thought to use the 1 Day unlimited travel pass to explore the things on my own  Pros  1 Clean stations 2 Good security checks 3 Easy navigations onboard the train 4 On time performance (Luckily there was no breakdown or delay during my visit) 5 Announcements in local as well as English language 6 Gives beautiful view of the city  Cons   1 Some stations may not be accessible with  escalators either side you need to walk through the stairs or the to catch the escalators you need to climb some steps manually  2 As I am coming from Singapore I expected 1 pass to work through all the public transportation system(atleast the metro rail if not on the buses) but I understood a BTS pass cannot be used on MRT  ProTip  1 Apply for 1 day unlimited pass at 140 baht to explore the whole of BTS  2 If coming from Don Muang Airport Airport Bus 543 at 30 baht to Mochit station and then BTS to your stay will be useful combination  3 If planning to explore Grand Palace and Temples alight at Saphan Taksin BTS Ferry Charge is 1520 Baht per person from Saphan Taksin BTS to the pier 8 from which you can walk to Grand Palace and the famous temples  4 A stay near BTS Asok is helpful for those willing to explore Sukhumvit Areas   5 BTS Asok is walkable to Sukhumvit MRT Terminal 21 Mall and other Nightlife Attractions  6 Ekkamai and Morchit BTS stations have Bus Terminals to transit to Pattaya  7 If you have plans to goto Pattaya it will be nearer to goto Ekkamai BTS from Asok  Do let me know if you found my review helpful‚ò∫Ô∏è

result.opinion: Clean stations

title: very helpful
review: The BTS Skytrain can be very crowded but there are frequent trains at all stations very handy and inexpensive

result.opinion: Frequent trains at all stations are very handy and inexpensive.

title: Fast to go!
review: Very nice transportation system in bangkok  my advise if you go on group two or more better check out taxi  i used the rome 2 rio to compare my journey anhwhere in bkk and it works well  I travelled number of 2 and we ended up mostly taking taxi as the cost is pretty much same (depends from and to where) again  please check your distance and see the cost  Here I post the taxi meter fare   Also consider take the yellow green taxi  They never say no  never refused and always use meter no matter how near the destination

title: It¬¥s a nice mean of transportation...
review: and it can actually be more expensive than taxi (if you are more than three persons and if you travel more than five stops or so  each ticket can be 42 baht)   As soon as you figure out the different lines and the correct floor it¬¥s easy We bought single tickets but if you plan to take a lot of stops (one stop is only 15 baht or so) and several times you should look into a daypass It cost around 140 baht  Also The kids were the same price as adults  children under 90 cm are free

title: So easy!
review: I loved having the BTS available in Bangkok When you arrive at a station you buy your ticket from a ticket machine There's a map with a price next to each stop next to the machine Choose the amount on the ticket machine and put coins in If you don't have coins you can get change from the office You take your ticket and slide it into the turnstile Hang on to it because you need to put it in when you get to your destination It is great to fly over all of the traffic on the roads The BTS is super clean and quick (no eating or drinking in the stations or on the train) I only wish there were more lines that took you to more places like the temples

result.opinion: The BTS is super clean

title: Our Favourite Medium of Travel
review: We can swear by it its very convenient to travel in Bangkok away from the traffic and the humdrum of the city

result.opinion: Very convenient to travel in Bangkok

title: Easy & Efficient
review: Cheap and easy transport no need for taxis and spending time in crazy traffic AC so great for a cool down Run regular your never waiting more than 10 minutes Announcements also in English so great for foreign travellers Always spotless clean

result.opinion: Cheap and easy transport, no need for taxis and spending time in crazy traffic

title: BTW Review
review: We used BTS to travel to different places in Bangkok and found it very convenient and comfortable Lots of stations easy ticket purchase and comfortable wagons

result.opinion: BTS is convenient and comfortable

title: Cheap travel
review: The metro in Bangkok is very clean and easy to navigate Tickets are cheap It gets busy (like any major underground system) but users are generally orderly when enter and exiting trains   Used the metro mainly when we stayed in the Sukhumvit area to get in to the older part of the city There are no stations near sights such as the grand palace so we used metro to Saphan Taksin and then took a boat to visit the sights in the old quarter

result.opinion: The metro in Bangkok is very clean

title: Best way to travel
review: We used the BTS to get around Bangkok alongside using the subway Extremely cheap and quick way to travel around Bangkok especially with the constant congested traffic on the roads

result.opinion: Extremely cheap and quick way to travel around Bangkok

title: Clean and fast
review: Good train service very cheap clean and safe with frequent security checks Covers outside the tourist area

result.opinion: Good train service very cheap clean and safe with frequent security checks

title: easiest way to get around
review: effortless in buying a ticket for any number of days you want to travel very safe clean and convenient people are not pushy what more can you say much like many other metro systems around links up to the river or railway then pop onto other forms of transport if it doesn't go where you want to see

result.opinion: Very safe and clean
Effortless in buying a ticket for any number of days you want to travel

title: Good job!!
review: Very good service always in time Easy to use also for foreigners everything wrote on monitors

result.opinion: Very good service, easy to use, staff quality
Very good service always in time Easy to use also for foreigners Everything wrote on monitors that corresponded to aspect

title: Great way to travel
review: Get a fast pass and go all over the city Fast safe and convenient AC can be a bit too cool Take it to the weekend market at Mo Chit Station

result.opinion: Fast safe and convenient
Fast, safe, and convenient

title: No better way to travel around Bangkok
review: There really is no better way to travel around Bangkok than by using the BTS Skytrain It is fast efficient and so convenient  There are 2 lines that connect at Siam and my advice is to try to secure accommodation closer to the Skytrain as you will be able to move around the city above the traffic below  You can buy single tickets but make sure that you have coins to by these(change is available at the offices) however the simplest is the local Rabbit Card with as much Thai Baht as you think you will need and then just tap your card on the terminals as you pass through  The Skytrain is above the streets Most stations do have an escalator on both sides of the roads and lifts are also now being installed  The trains are regular super air conditioned and only crowded at rush air Use the Skytrain and enjoy more from Bangkok

result.opinion: The BTS Skytrain is fast, efficient, and convenient.

title: Great way to get around
review: Fast efficient and on time The BTS is the way I get around the city it is great Comfortable the AC definitely works and it is clean   Avoid the tragic and negotiations with tuk tuks and taxis The BTS in combination with the MRT can get you to most of the downtown core Use some boat taxis and you move freely around the city

result.opinion: Fast efficient and on time The BTS is the way I get around the city it is greatComfortable the AC definitely works and it is clean Avoid the tragic and negotiations with tuk tuks and taxis The BTS in combination with the MRT can get you to most of the downtown core Use some boat taxis and you move freely around the city

title: Public Transport
review: As good as any European country if not better on time short waits easy to use access to the stations and reliable I used the BTS train daily to and from work I cannot complain about the service

result.opinion: Punctuality is reliable
The service is convenient.

title: similar to MRT in Singapore
review: clean and very much like the MRT in Singapore 42 Baht for single trip anywhere the single trip card also has the station names and number in case you cannot see the map aircon is very strong and cooling unlike in Singapore

result.opinion: Clean and very much like the MRT in Singapore

title: Best and cheapest way to travel
review: Submerge yourself into the local way avoid taxis and tuk tuks at a much higher price and jump on the train It does get busy at rush hour but atleast your not stuck in bangkok traffic  Use Google maps to find the best train route

result.opinion: Use the train to avoid taxis and tuk tuks
Use the train to avoid taxis and tuk tuks at a higher price

title: Excellent....at the moment!
review: Skytrain (or BTS as everyone refers to i) is the the cleanest cheapest and safest way to travel in Bangkok  albeit the network is limited but growing  In fact it is a victim of its success as "rush hour" now extends through much of the day  The trains are very frequent but still crowded  They should add a carriage to each train (the platforms are long enough and marked for extra carriages)  However still BTS should be your preferred means of transport in Bangkok

result.opinion: BTS is the safest way to travel in Bangkok
Skytrain is the cleanest way to travel in Bangkok

title: Travel with Ease
review: The Skytrain is a great way to get around Bangkok  so much easier than by road Thais are very polite on the Sky Train always waiting to get on in neat rows and stopping when the train is full Very little of the pushing and shoving the you experience in European capitals And very reasonably priced

result.opinion: The review doesn't mention anything about the cleanliness of the Skytrain.

title: Clean and inexpensive
review: Very easy to use inexpensive and very clean The AC is a great break from the Bangkok heat It is crowded at peak times or public holidays

result.opinion: Very clean

title: Easy travel on BTS Skytrain
review: Easy and safe to use clean and the two main lines are Silom and Sukhumvit Trains run until midnight and the main interchange station is at Siam It can get very full at peak times in the morning and evening with commuters traveling to and from work

result.opinion: Easy to use and safe
Easy and safe to use
Easy and safe to use clean

title: BTS
review: Very efficient  clean and cheap Easy to learn routes and where to go to change to other lines or MRT

result.opinion: Very efficient and clean
Very efficient, clean and cheap. Easy to learn routes and where to go to change to other lines or MRT.

title: Excellent Transport
review: This is a light rail  subway type of transport in Bangkok They run above the main streets and there are about 3 different lines identified by color and line name We took the light green line from our hotel in center of Bangkok  holiday inn  to the Weekend Market as well as to nearby malls There are machines to buy tickets which mostly take only coins Some stations have manned booths where you can buy a ticket  Note keep your ticket after you enter the platform you need the ticket to get out at your destination  The skytrain is really comfortable and makes easy and fun travel  air conditioned

title: Excellent way to see this sprawling city.
review: Cheap and great aircon  The downside is how packed it can get  You can barely move with arms going everywhere as we hurtle forward trying to steady ourselves  Perhaps more services should be running on certain days

result.opinion: Cheap and great aircon.  The downside is how packed it can get.  You can barely move with arms going everywhere as we hurtle forward trying to steady ourselves.  Perhaps more services should be running on certain days that corresponded to aspect: Convenience

Cheap and great aircon The downside is how packed it can get You can barely move with arms going everywhere as we hurtle forward trying to steady ourselves Perhaps more services should be running on certain days that corresponded to The downside is how packed it can get You can barely move with arms going everywhere as we hurtle forward trying to steady ourselves Perhaps more services should be running on certain days

title: Convenient (if it works)
review: I take the BTS at least twice daily going to and back from work Try to avoid the rush hour as they tend to broke and result in tons of people get stuck on their tiny platforms Rainy days also cause trouble to the train system (only god knows why and how) Still it's the best public transportation system in Bangkok for now

title: Great & Easy way to beat the Traffic
review: This is an easy and cool (literally with AC) way to get around the city Quite cheap for a family and very clean A tip is to have some coins as the ticket machines do not take notes You have to queue to get change About 55 baht was the most expensive fare one way Very frequent services was a bonus

result.opinion: Very clean

title: if you enjoy full blast advertising that is the place to be
review: even if is the fastest way to move around the city is definitely not much of a pleasure starting with the non existent disability friendly futures and the continous harassment by stupid advertising that you will otherwise happily skip always very crowded

result.opinion: Non existent disability friendly futures and the continous harassment by stupid advertising

title: Easy!
review: Definitely the best way to get around the main area of Bangkok if you can book accommodation nearby one of the BTS stops It's easy efficient and air conditioned

result.opinion: Definitely the best way to get around

title: Great transport system
review: I had no problem navigating the public transport system around und bangkok  it was user friendly and regular service  easy to link with other lines Very helpful staff

result.opinion: Very helpful staff

title: Easy, fun and convenient
review: It's busy and popular but easy to use The attendants and security are very helpful and it's a great way to get around the city The traffic is Bangkok is horrific and taxis can be over priced Take the BTS and Uber in the city

result.opinion: It's easy to use, a great way to get around the city

title: Just an experience
review: An impressive solution to the suffocating traffic stagnation in the city of Bangkok A long concert above ground level train line transgressing the narrow streets of the city Take a trip and look at the streets from above

result.opinion: An impressive solution to the suffocating traffic stagnation

title: Convenient and punctual
review: So far in my travels this is the best transport system to get around a large busy city    Trains run on time and very frequent Carriages are clean with a no eating on board policy which is great  PA system tells you which station you are approaching so that you know when to get off  Stations themselves are well signposted and clean with staff to help  You need the correct amount of change for day tickets which are good value for tourists  Of course it will be busier at rush hours

result.opinion: The carriages are clean.

title: Convince
review: Staff his helfpfull as well as other commuters The machine is very easy  used Train run on time and coach are clean

result.opinion: Coach are clean

title: Best Mode of Transportation
review: It's the fastest mode of transportation though expensive But it saves from the notorious bangkok traffic Radidly expanding At times it gets too crowded The aircon is effective inside the coaches

result.opinion: It saves from the notorious Bangkok traffic. At times it gets too crowded. The aircon is effective inside the coaches.

title: So easy
review: This is such an easy and cheap way to get around the streets seem to be a constant car park so you will save a lot of time You can connect to the airport link station as well  this cost 40 baht and takes 30 min to get to and from the airport A taxi will take an hour or more depending on traffic and will cost you around 300 baht

result.opinion: Easy and cheap way to get around

title: Excellent Service
review: Brilliant quality service Always very busy but trains run on a regular basis Very good air conditioning and trains all in excellent condition

result.opinion: Trains run on a regular basis

title: Cheap and quick. But oh the queues!
review: Tickets are cheap and the system is efficient But popular stations like Mo Chit can get mobbed by people buying tickets  Keep small bills and coins handy Some ticket machines only take coins  Pity the system stops at the edge of the old city Can leave you with a half hour taxi or tuk tuk ride to Khaosan Road

title: Time saver
review: Great way to get around The traffic jam in Bangkok is horrible It is clean air conditioned to beat the heat Easiest way to get around

result.opinion: Easiest way to get around
Clean air conditioned to beat the heat

title: Very convenient
review: Very convenient and reasonable price Not recommend for the rush hour or peak time as over crowded and take longer to go

result.opinion: Very convenient and reasonable price

title: Fascinating and the best way to travel through Bangkok
review: Catching the Skytrain and using  hhe river taxis is the best way to travel through Bangkok One must avoid the traffic for sure The city is not made for cars as there are just too many of them The skytrain stops throughout at all the major stops in the city and combines beautifully with the river taxis Its a worthwhile adventure

title: Clean and make life easy in Bangkok
review: I would say that BTS skytrain is one of the cleanest trains comparing to other big cities   Try to avoid rush hours and then everything is OK  The area on the platform is too small for rush hour but it seems to be OK during other hours

result.opinion: BTS skytrain is one of the cleanest trains

title: Great for getting around Bangkok
review: So easy for getting around Bangkok We used it every day We stay at Pathumwan Princess hotel with National Stadium BTS just a short walk Great way to get around not having to worry about traffic Clean safe and graffiti free trains Buy a rabbit card for easy travel

result.opinion: So easy for getting around Bangkok
Clean safe and graffiti free trains

title: Very good MRT but does not stop near maint tourist attractions
review: Good way to avoid rush in Bangkok Purchase your ticket at the machine before travelling the price depends of how many stations you go Only negative skytrain does not stop near main tourist attractions

result.opinion: Good way to avoid rush in Bangkok

title: Clean & efficient
review: Took it two times within the day both non peak and peak hours It was a good experience to travel with the locals and get around the city without the jams on the road   Bring coins to buy tickets If you have notes it's fine they have counters ready to change notes to coins for you  If you are taking more than 4 train rides a day buy a day pass it's cheaper   If you have heavy baggage you may consider travelling during off peak timings so you dont squeeze with the crowd

title: A convenient mean of transport
review: Bts is fast to move the price is affordable I like to travel by bts But it is really crowded =))))) The train is modern ( what a cold air con ) attached with a lot of advertisment posters move softly Bangkok Bts system still doesn't have many stations and         they are planning to open some new ones in the future which are under construction

result.opinion: Fast to move, affordable, modern train, soft movement

title: Neat and nice
review: It is neat and nice Just about good the frequency of travelling couches in an hour which adjusts to the passenger volume

result.opinion: Neat and nice

title: very nice
review: Good way of travel Cheap too please check with stations for any clarification regarding your start and end of journey

result.opinion: Good way of travel Cheap too

title: Fantastic way to travel around Bangkok
review: The BTS Skytrain makes travelling around Bangkok a breeze We purchased a day pass for 120 baht that enabled us to hop on and off at various stops We found the other travellers to be far more courteous than in Sydney with younger people standing up for us We also found Thai people to be most helpful at the stations when we were consulting the maps  coming up and giving us directions The trains weren't overly crowded at any time It is simply a great way to travel avoiding the congestion on the roads

result.opinion: The BTS Skytrain makes travelling around Bangkok a breeze

title: Leisure
review: I think BTS is the best transportation in Thailand In addition it's is fastest comparing to other transportations such as taxi bus etc

result.opinion: BTS is the fastest transportation in Thailand

title: Great way to get around BKK
review: BTS system is great  We used it to get around everywhere  But it does get very crowded and you'll want to make sure you keep your belonging close to you and not out of your sight

result.opinion: BTS system is great  We used it to get around everywhere

title: Favorite station Nana
review: I love the wat they make announcements of the station arriving Especially the Nana station in Thai accent The railways are clean and well managed with proper security and helping staff for commuters It's like the lifeline of Bangkok several people use bts for day to day travel It has a direct airport connect Pretty convenient to tourist's

result.opinion: The railways are clean and well managed with proper security and helping staff for commuters

title: Sky
review: Sky train transportation bangkok bts family trip fun everytimeyou will see city of bangkok from the skyhehehe

result.opinion: Fun everytime you will see city of bangkok from the sky
Sky train transportation is fun for a family trip

title: Easy to get around
review: Was a bit scared of ending up miles in the wrong direction but found it easy to navigate with low fares  good maps clean air conditioned trains

result.opinion: Clean air conditioned trains

title: A great way to get around  Bangkok.
review: The BTS lines intersect with each other and also the MRT(subway) and provide a great way of getting around an otherwise traffic grid locked city Super efficient and nexpensive

result.opinion: Super efficient and inexpensive

title: Cheap travelling from airport
review: Cheap and easy way to travel from airport to centre of Bangkok then you take a meter taxi to your residence  Ensure its a metered taxi or negotiate a price to your destination

result.opinion: Convenient way to travel from airport to centre of Bangkok

title: Top way to travel
review: Purchase your ticket at the machine before travelling work out what station you want to travel to and the price is shown next to that station You can get change from the booths

result.opinion: Convenient to purchase tickets at the machine before travelling

title: Good way to go around
review: in fact the traffic is very busy I used this option to travel around whenever I could instead of being stuck in traffic with a pricey taxi

result.opinion: Used this option to travel around whenever I could instead of being stuck in traffic with a pricey taxi

title: Traveling around Bangkok
review: Using the Skytain makes visiting the sights of Bangkok very easy and allows you to see many more than if you were stuck in traffic  The train system goes throughout the city and has many places to connect with the underground system  The system also connects with covered overhead walkways that allow you to move around without battling with traffic to cross a street

result.opinion: The Skytrain makes visiting the sights of Bangkok very easy
Using the Skytrain makes visiting the sights of Bangkok very easy and allows you to see many more than if you were stuck in traffic

title: Love bts
review: Comfortable and affordable transport option from the airport to the city center Love the metro stations as well

result.opinion: Comfortable and affordable transport option from the airport to the city center. Love the metro stations as well.

title: BTS avoiding traffic in Bangkok
review: We usually use BTS to avoid bad traffic in bangkok Usually we stayed at city  Shukumvit area The tix price is cheap But in rush hour so many people Qing for buy the tix on the machine Better you buy a prepaid card to avoid Qing The BTS train is clean Just look at the map & folllow the BTS line You will save your "traffic" üòÄüòÄüòÄ

result.opinion: The BTS train is clean

title: Getting around BBk
review: First time to use the sky train Easy to buy tickets  you can get change at the counters Choose your stop press station number pay the amount and receive your ticket We travelled all morning on the BTS and didn't wait more than a few minutes for a train to arrive It's also good to be able to see a bit of Bangkok while on public transport

result.opinion: Easy to buy tickets, didn't wait more than a few minutes for a train to arrive

title: Excellent Mass Transport System
review: One of the best Metro services Better than Washington and New York in terms of cleanliness and user freindliness Could manage to travel without guide Well connected

result.opinion: One of the best Metro services Better than Washington and New York in terms of cleanliness
One of the best Metro services Better than Washington and New York in terms of cleanliness and user friendliness Could manage to travel without guide Well connected

title: Mass Transport
review: We used BTS Skytrain to reach Chatuchak MarketCost not expensive quite cheap In 10 minutes we reached Chatuchak Market from MBK Mall Station

result.opinion: We used BTS Skytrain to reach Chatuchak Market. Cost not expensive quite cheap. In 10 minutes we reached Chatuchak Market from MBK Mall Station.
BTS Skytrain is a cheap and convenient way to get to Chatuchak Market.

title: Good train system
review: BTS train was great the price was low only 20tbp for a journey   Also the station open till late around midnight and easy to use

result.opinion: Great price, station open late and easy to use.

title: Transportation
review: I don't live in BKK but I have to be in BKK for conferences and schools Normally I use taxi but it is very expensive from the place I stay I got a chance to learn how to use BTS and I love it I got rabbit card to fill the card so it made my life very simple not to be in the line to get the ticket since I know that I will be in BKK very often I think  I made the best decision ever The only thing I want to say there are very crowded but happen to big city isn't it

result.opinion: Love it, made my life very simple

title: Still Not an Attraction
review: I first reviewed the BTS in 2012 Back then I said that it was not an attraction but rather a transport network And that is still the case  Is it useful Yes Does it help one get around Bangkok Yes Is it a tourist attraction No

result.opinion: BTS is a useful transport network that helps get around Bangkok, but it is not a tourist attraction.

title: Better to use BTS for transport in Bangkok
review: Got some bad experiences on trying the taxi eg driver refused to use meter traffic jam costed an hour on taxi for just one BTS station distance therefore highly recommended to use the BTS even thought it is quite crowded during the rush hours

result.opinion: Highly recommended to use the BTS even though it is quite crowded during the rush hours.
